summary: AI-Powered Telemedicine Platform with Motoko backend and React + TypeScript frontend, featuring healthcare interface elements for improving healthcare access
imageRequirements:
## Required Images
- Medical professional avatar placeholder illustration for user profiles (doctor-avatar.dim_200x200.png)
- Telemedicine hero banner with healthcare theme showing digital health concept (telemedicine-hero.dim_1200x400.png)
- Stethoscope icon for medical dashboard (stethoscope-icon.dim_64x64.png)
- Calendar icon for appointment scheduling (calendar-icon.dim_64x64.png)
- Video consultation placeholder icon (video-call-icon.dim_128x128.png)

existing_features.title: Implement the main dashboard layout matching the uploaded design reference, including navigation structure, header layout, and overall page composition
Apply the color scheme, typography, and visual styling from the uploaded design reference throughout the application
Create healthcare-specific UI components as shown in the design reference, including patient cards, appointment widgets, and medical information displays
Implement the telemedicine consultation interface as depicted in the design, including video call placeholder area and consultation controls

new_feature_requests.summary: Create backend data models for managing patients, appointments, and consultation sessions to support the telemedicine platform features
Implement backend functions for CRUD operations on patients, appointments, and medical records
